name: 22/23 Y1C – Team 12 – Padro’s Escape
description:
A 2.5D platformer that will use continuous movement test your timing and dexterity skills. Use your jump, dash and halt abilities to help Padro escape through all 5 levels! Each level will introduce a new challenge for Padro to overcome!

Keyboard controls work, but a game pad is advised:

  • Jump: Space
  • Dash: Shift
  • Halt: Ctrl

This game was made as a student project for Breda University of Applied Sciences, Year 1, Block C. The task was to create a platformer game with a minimal artistic touch, with a focus on character movement, camera, and controls. Each designer on the team had to create a level that introduces one special feature.
